Parameters: CompoundButton: The compound button view whose state has changed.
boolean: The new checked state of buttonView.
onCheckedChanged(android.widget.Compound.Description: Called when the checked state of a compound button has changed.
onCheckedChanged(android.widget.Compound.FullName: public abstract void onCheckedChanged (CompoundButton buttonView, boolean isChecked)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the checked state of a compound button changed.
